title: EDPR granted €112m for two onshore wind farms in Portugal
lead: The wind farms will have a total capacity of 125MW and will support the country’s renewable energy goals

title: EU backs inter-regional partnerships for hydrogen pilot project
lead: They will benefit from the Commission experts’ support, providing advice on how to best combine EU funds to finance projects, among others

title: Total and Iberdrola join forces to bid for 1GW offshore wind farm in Danish North Sea
lead: The Danish Energy Agency has pre-qualified the application submitted by the partners to participate in the auction for the Thor offshore wind farm

title: Energy switches 2.3% down in 2020 amid coronavirus pandemic
lead: Almost 6.2 million energy switches happened last year, according to a new report

title: Almost 429k US clean energy jobs lost in 2020 due to Covid-19 pandemic
lead: A new report predicts the sector will not return to pre-Covid employment rate until 2023

title: Total and ENGIE commit to building ‘France’s largest’ green hydrogen project
lead: The 40MW electrolyser, which will be located at one of the Total’s biorefineries, is forecast to produce five tonnes of green hydrogen every day

title: Coronavirus pandemic prompted ‘largest drop’ in US emissions since World War II
lead: According to a new report, emissions in the US fell 10.3% in 2020

title: One EV was registered in the UK every 180 seconds during 2020
lead: Go Ultra Low highlights that despite the coronavirus pandemic shutting showrooms, EV sales soared by 140% last year compared to 2019

title: Wind turbine manufacturer Siemens Gamesa to shut down two blade factories in Spain
lead: The closures, which were made as a result of a lack of regional demand, will lead to the loss of 266 jobs

title: Plastic bag charge in Scotland to double to 10p
lead: The move is expected to come into effect from 1st April
